pages.text: You woke from a dream in which you roasted specially prepared marshmallows over a campfire, then, after eating one, looked up at the night sky through a spyglass and watched a distant sun explode. Travelng

pages.title: Crafting Recipe
pages.text: Be careful not to burn them!

pages.title: Titration Barrel Recipe
pages.text: Of course, using Stardust turns out to be more efficient.
